data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Shan. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shan, Myanmar (Burma)
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Shan, Myanmar (Burma) to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 20 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Shan, Myanmar (Burma) to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 283,291 believers in Shan that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Palaung, Pale people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, remind your church in Shan that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Shan, Myanmar (Burma) that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Shan, Myanmar (Burma) so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
